meanings.definition: A person or company that transports goods or cargo for a fee.
meanings.sent1: The freighters delivered the packages to the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The freighters were busy moving items from one place to another.
meanings.sent3: The freighters joked about racing each other to see who could deliver first.
meanings.sent4: The freighters sailed through the city streets, carrying their precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The image of the freighters bustling with activity stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A ship or aircraft used for transporting goods in bulk.
meanings.sent1: The freighters docked at the port to unload their cargo.
meanings.sent2: The freighters crossed the ocean with containers full of goods.
meanings.sent3: The freighters had a party on board to celebrate a successful journey.
meanings.sent4: The freighters soared through the sky like giant birds carrying loads of supplies.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the massive freighters on the horizon was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The goods or cargo being transported.
meanings.sent1: The freighters contained valuable merchandise for the market.
meanings.sent2: The freighters carried a variety of products from one country to another.
meanings.sent3: The freighters decided to have a dance party with the cargo boxes as partners.
meanings.sent4: The freighters held within them the hopes and dreams of many businesses.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the freighters' cargo lingered in the air long after they had left.
